name: EnviroGolf
description:
A text based sport game with a focus on the environment? What more could you want!

Envirogolf is a short concise game (read: less than 15 minutes). Experience golf through the written word and learn about the environmental impact of your actions* playing a white-collar leisure sport. Pick between three golf club options and strength levels in this digital three hole game. How is your recreation destroying the environment?* Let's find out!

It's the perfect length game to enjoy between putts.


*All EnviroGolf facts have not been verified by any legal or governing bodies.
